title: Quiz - CurrentTap - ESI - 1st to 7th May 2023
instruction: Of the 14 parameters tracked quarterly under the Twenty Point Programme, the government achieved a more than 90% target completion ("very good") in six parameters and 80-90% ("good") in five, according to data released recently (May 2023) by the ____________. In the April-December 2022 period, the performance in three of 14 parameters was "poor" or below 80% target. The program has been revised several times, most recently in 2006 to align with economic reforms, liberalisation, and globalisation.

quiz.text:
Recently (May 2023), the union Health minister has reviewed the status of organ donations and transplant with senior officers of the Health Ministry. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the status of organ donations and transplant in India?

A.      Total organ transplants in the country were more than 50,000 in the year 2022.

B.      India has a network of Organ & Tissues Transplant Organizations at National (NOTTO) and State level (SOTTO) only.

C.      NOTTO was established under the Transplantation of Human Organs (Amendment) Act, 2011.
options: A and C
B and C
C only
A only
A and B

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), India Health Dialogue (IHD), a collaborative and stakeholders’ platform to build robust ecosystem to revolutionize health and health care sector for the future has been launched. IHD is a global initiative of which of the following entities?
options: India Chamber of Business and Commerce
Indian Medical Association (IMA)
Ministry of MSME
Indian Council of Medical Research
All of the above

quiz.text: The Ministry of Coal has set a target to generate __________ coal in FY30 to increase India's energy security and realise AtmaNirbhar Bharat by substituting domestically mined coal for imported coal.
options: 1.3 billion tonnes (BT)
2.5 billion tonnes (BT)
1.5 billion tonnes (BT)
2.0 billion tonnes (BT)
5 billion tonnes (BT)

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to India-UAE Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement (CEPA)?

A.      It came into force in February 2023.

B.      The agreement includes Sanitary and Phytosanitary (SPS) measures.

C.      Trade has registered a year-on-year increase of 16%.
options: A and C
B only
B and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: India had a trade _______ with the United States of __________ in 2021-22.
options: surplus; $32.8 billion
deficit; $32.8 billion
deficit; $29 billion
surplus; $29 billion
surplus; $43.31 billion

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), data has been shared by Ministry of Coal regarding increase in domestic coal production. India’s overall coal Production has seen a quantum jump of 22.6% to ___________ in FY 2022-23 as compared to FY 2018-2019.
options: 893.08 MT (Million tonnes)
843.08 MT (Million tonnes)
728.72 MT (Million tonnes)
793.08 MT (Million tonnes)
788.72 MT (Million tonnes)

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Rail Vikas Nigam Limited (RVNL), a Central Public Sector Enterprises of Ministry of Railways, has been granted ___________.
options: Maharatna Status
Mini Ratna-I Status
Navratna Status
Mini Ratna-II Status
Ratna Status

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the criteria for granting Navratna status to CPSEs?

A.      CPSE must have a Mini Ratna-I Status

B.      Annual turnover should be above Rs. 25,000 crore during the last 3 years time period.

C.      Should have a composite score of 60 or above in the six selected performance indicators.
options: A and B
B and C
C only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: According to latest data released by the Ministry of Finance, the gross Goods and Services Tax (GST) revenue collected in the month of April 2023 touched an all-time high of __________.
options: Rs 1.68 lakh crore
Rs 1.75 lakh crore
Rs 1.78 lakh crore
Rs 1.87 lakh crore
Rs 1.91 lakh crore

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to PM Gati Shakti National Master Plan?

A.      It brings together 21 infrastructure related ministries.

B.      It has subsumed the National Infrastructure Pipeline that was launched in 2017.

C.      Its target is to create 7 industrial corridors and 2 new defence corridors
options: B and C
A and C
B only
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to PRET Initiative?

A.      PRET stands for “Prevention and Resilience for Emerging Threats”.

B.      It is an initiative of World Bank and UNDP.

C.      It works on a three-pronged approach.

D.      Its initial focus area is respiratory viruses.
options: A, B and C
B and D
A, C and D
C and D
B and C

quiz.text: According to the paragraph, what would fill the ___X____ space?
options: 9 to 12
6 to 12
11 & 12
6 to 8
None of the above

quiz.text: According to the paragraph, what would come in place of ___Y___?
options: Meta
Microsoft
Amazon
Accenture
Google

quiz.text: CORSIA and LTAG, which have been in news recently (May 2023), are the initiatives of which of the following organizations?
options: International Civil Aviation Organisation (ICAO)
World Meteorological Organization (WMO)
World Trade Organization (WTO)
UN Development Programme (UN DP)
World Bank (WB)

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), India and Russia have agreed to explore RuPay and _____ Cards for easy payments in their respective countries.
options: Czar
Bir
Rouble
Lir
Mir

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Business Ready Project?

A.      It will replace the Ease of Doing Business Report by World Bank.

B.      Expert inputs will be taken from within and outside the World Bank Group, including the private sector, and civil society organization but excluding the governments.

C.      1st report will be published in 2023.
options: A only
A and C
A and B
C only
A, B, and C

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to ‘Innovative Finance Facility for Climate in Asia and the Pacific (IF-CAP)’?
options: It is an initiative of Asian Development Bank.
India, Japan and United States are among the initial partners.
The model adopted is ‘$1 in, $5 out’ (leverage guarantee structure).
Focus area is providing a range of grants for project preparation along with guarantees for parts of ADB’s sovereign loan portfolios.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the GST Network has informed that businesses whose turnover is _________ must upload their electronic invoices on Invoice Registration Portal (IRP) within 7 days of the issue of such invoice.
options: Rs 10 crore and above
Rs 50 crore and above
Rs 250 crore and above
Rs 200 crore and above
Rs 100 crore and above

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, which of the following entities has released the data?
options: NITI Aayog
Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation.
Ministry of Finance
1 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text:
The performance in which of the following parameters was "poor" or below 80% target?

A.      Area covered under plantation (public and forest lands).

B.      Construction of roads under the Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY).

C.      Construction of houses under Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Gramin).

D.      Electricity Supply.
options: A and B
A, B and C
C and D
A and D
All of the above
